snippet: Maria Sharapova battled her own nerves and a surprisingly difficult opponent, Klara Zakopalova of the Czech Republic, before winning in three sets to reach the French Open quarterfinals.
abstract: Maria Sharapova battled her own nerves and a surprisingly difficult opponent, Klara Zakopalova of the Czech Republic, before winning in three sets to reach the French Open quarterfinals.

headline.main: Sharapova Battles Nerves, but Outlasts Zakopalova
